named-query.name: XMLFieldAccess.query
named-query.query: SELECT xfa FROM XMLFieldAccess xfa WHERE xfa.id = :id AND xfa.strField = :strVal

named-query.name: XMLPropAccess.query
named-query.query: SELECT xpa FROM XMLPropAccess xpa WHERE xpa.id = :id AND xpa.strProp = :strVal

named-query.name: XMLDFMPA.query
named-query.query: SELECT df FROM XMLDFMPA df WHERE df.id = :id AND df.stringField = :strVal

named-query.name: XMLDFMPA.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM XMLDFMPA p WHERE p.id = :id AND p.strField = :strVal

named-query.name: XMLDPMFA.query
named-query.query: SELECT dp FROM XMLDPMFA dp WHERE dp.id = :id AND dp.strField = :strVal

named-query.name: XMLDPMFA.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM XMLDPMFA p WHERE p.id = :id AND p.strProp = :strVal

named-query.name: XMLPropertySub.query
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM XMLPropertySub ps WHERE ps.id = :id AND ps.name = :name AND ps.createDate = :crtDate

named-query.name: XMLPropertySub.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM XMLPropertySub ps WHERE ps.id = :id AND ps.name = :name AND ps.crtDate = :crtDate

named-query.name: XMLFieldSub.query
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLFieldSub fs WHERE fs.id = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.crtDate = :crtDate

named-query.name: XMLFieldSub.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLFieldSub fs WHERE fs.id = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.createDate = :crtDate

named-query.name: XMLFieldSub2.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM XMLFieldSub2 ps WHERE ps.id = :id AND ps.name = :name AND ps.createDate = :crtDate

named-query.name: XMLMixedFieldSub.query
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLMixedFieldSub fs WHERE fs.mid = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.createDate = :crtDate AND fs.myField = :myField

named-query.name: XMLMixedFieldSub.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLMixedFieldSub fs WHERE fs.mid = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.myFieldProp = :myField

named-query.name: XMLSuperPropertyEntity.query
named-query.query: SELECT sfe FROM XMLSuperPropertyEntity sfe WHERE sfe.id = :id AND sfe.name = :name

named-query.name: XMLSuperPropertyEntity.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT sfe FROM XMLSuperPropertyEntity sfe WHERE sfe.id = :id AND sfe.name = :name AND sfe.crtDate = :crtDate

named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM XMLFieldSub3 ps WHERE ps.id = :id AND ps.name = :name AND ps.crtDate = :crtDate

named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM XMLFieldSub3 ps WHERE ps.id = :id AND ps.name = :name AND ps.createDate = :crtDate

named-query.name: XMLPropEmbedEntity.query
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLPropEmbedEntity fs WHERE fs.id = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.embedProp.fName = :firstName AND fs.embedProp.lName = :lastName

named-query.name: XMLPropEmbedEntity.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLPropEmbedEntity fs WHERE fs.id = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.embedProp.firstName = :firstName AND fs.embedProp.lastName = :lastName

named-query.name: XMLFieldEmbedEntity.query
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLFieldEmbedEntity fs WHERE fs.id = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.epa.firstName = :firstName AND fs.epa.lastName = :lastName

named-query.name: XMLFieldEmbedEntity.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLFieldEmbedEntity fs WHERE fs.id = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.epa.fName = :firstName AND fs.epa.lName = :lastName

named-query.name: XMLPropMixedEntity.query
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLPropMixedEntity fs WHERE fs.idval = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.ema.firstName = :firstName AND fs.ema.lastName = :lastName AND fs.ema.mName = :middleName

named-query.name: XMLPropMixedEntity.badQuery
named-query.query: SELECT fs FROM XMLPropMixedEntity fs WHERE fs.idval = :id AND fs.name = :name AND fs.ema.firstName = :firstName AND fs.ema.lastName = :lastName AND fs.ema.middleName = :middleName
